title: Conference Championship Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice for Titans-Chiefs, Packers-49ers (Football 1/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for gambling advice for this weekend's conference championship games. The guys start by analyzing the AFC Championship between the Titans and Chiefs (5:15), and follow with an NFC Championship breakdown of the Packers and 49ers (38:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
